channel.title: How to make the server base diffrent on your home for your server
channel.description: will any of u help me cuz when i went to player.class and searched for // initial x and y coordinates of the player i got them and i changed them and i logged in my server with a new name and its still the same home can someone please help me

item.title: How to make the server base diffrent on your home for your server
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

Compile your server, then restart it.

You can do this by Running the ‘Compile’ or ‘build’ batch file (Whichever one you have), then wait until it says ‘Press any key to continue’, then close it. You then need to restart the server for the changes to take effect.

Once this is complete, Then you may log into your server with a new user name to test the changes.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make the server base diffrent on your home for your server
